cause.description:
PEACE - CLEAN PEACE - HONORABLE PEACE - STRONG PEACE!
Corrupted politicians who represent only the bunch of lousy people who follow them blindly like desperate stray dogs, are not wanted in this country!
Corrupted politicians who behave like the above are not wanted too!
Corrupted politicians who stick to their chair for years, create their dirty empire and suck up the country riches, are not wanted anymore!
1. Stand against all dirty politicians who abuse power to their personal benefits
2. Accept only leaders with genuine and true Mission
3. Do not support the corrupted by not voting in their favor
4. "WE" CHOOSE OUR REPRESENTATIVES
5. We want to judge the leaders! and bring the dirty ones DOWN!
6. We reject dirty dogs and clean dogs too; No dogs allowed in the house!
7. No dogs, No pigs, No cockroach (صَرْصور), No snakes, No lizards are allowed in da House!
8. You Lie, You Cheat, You Steal, you will be brought Down & Exposed!
9. We Will Revolte!
cause.name: LEBANON "UNCORRUPTED"
